scripts.clean: shx rm -rf generated-env && shx mkdir generated-env
scripts.generate:env-functions-app: node bin/index.js FUNCTIONS_APP_REPO FUNCTIONS_APP_BRANCH env.io-functions-app generated-env/env.io-functions-app
scripts.generate:env-functions-public: node bin/index.js FUNCTIONS_PUBLIC_REPO FUNCTIONS_PUBLIC_BRANCH env.io-functions-public generated-env/env.io-functions-public
scripts.generate:env-functions-admin: node bin/index.js FUNCTIONS_ADMIN_REPO FUNCTIONS_ADMIN_BRANCH env.io-functions-admin generated-env/env.io-functions-admin
scripts.generate:env-functions-services: node bin/index.js FUNCTIONS_SERVICES_REPO FUNCTIONS_SERVICES_BRANCH env.io-functions-services generated-env/env.io-functions-services
scripts.generate:env-functions-bonus: node bin/index.js FUNCTIONS_BONUS_REPO FUNCTIONS_BONUS_BRANCH env.io-functions-bonus generated-env/env.io-functions-bonus
scripts.generate:env-backend: node bin/index.js IO_BACKEND_REPO IO_BACKEND_BRANCH env.io-backend generated-env/env.io-backend
scripts.generate:env-notification-hub: node bin/index.js NOTIFICATION_HUB_REPO IO_NH_BRANCH env.io-notification-hub generated-env/env.io-notification-hub
scripts.generate:env-pagopa-proxy: node bin/index.js IO_PAGOPA_PROXY_REPO IO_PAGOPA_PROXY_BRANCH env.io-pagopa-proxy generated-env/env.io-pagopa-proxy
scripts.generate:env-fixtures: node bin/index.js IO_FIXTURES_REPO IO_FIXTURES_BRANCH env.io-fixtures generated-env/env.io-fixtures
